oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Leather pocketbook
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Five-fold leather pocketbook with identifying information written in ink on inside. It is dated April 30, 1865, Raleigh, North Carolina. The inscription reveals that it belonged to Albert Fuller, Co. K, New York Regt. Vols. Also written inside is "Reading Hill Co., Michigan." The pocketbook has two compartments.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
